                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String imageURL,
                     int difficulty,
                     Cell[][] pattern)
        Constructor of a new Window Pattern
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the pattern
        title - the title of the pattern
        imageURL - the imageURL of the pattern
        difficulty - the difficulty of the pattern
        pattern - the pattern structured as array of cells with already set constraints

      • getDiceOnCell

        public Dice getDiceOnCell(int row,
                          int col)
        Returns the Dice that is placed on the cell corresponding to the given row and column numbers.
        Parameters:
        row - row number of the patter corresponding to the cell where to get the dice.
        col - column number of the patter corresponding to the cell where to get the dice.
        Returns:
        the Dice that is placed on the cell corresponding to the given row and column numbers.

      • removeDiceFromCell

        public Dice removeDiceFromCell(int row,
                               int col)
        Returns the Dice that is placed on the cell corresponding to the given row and column numbers after having removed it.
        Parameters:
        row - row number of the patter corresponding to the cell where to remove the dice.
        col - column number of the patter corresponding to the cell where to remove the dice.
        Returns:
        the removed Dice that was placed on the cell corresponding to the given row and column numbers.

                             int row,

        Put a dice in the cell corresponding to the given row and column numbers.
        Parameters:
        dice - Dice to put in the given cell
        row - row number of the pattern corresponding the cell where to put the dice
        col - column number of the pattern corresponding the cell where to put the dice
        Returns:
        a boolean value representing if the action succeeded

      • moveDiceFromCellToCell

        public boolean moveDiceFromCellToCell(int fromRow,
                                      int fromCol,
                                      int toRow,
                                      int toCol)
        Move the dice placed on the specified row,column to the specified new row,column position
        Parameters:
        fromRow - row number representing the cell where to pick the dice
        fromCol - column number representing the cell where to pick the dice
        toRow - row number representing the cell where to place the picked dice
        toCol - column number representing the cell where to place the picked dice
        Returns:
        a boolean value representing if the action succeeded
